    Multimedia and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory

    National Taiwan Normal University

    Advancing the frontiers of computer vision, multimedia analysis, and artificial intelligence

    Explore Our Research View Publications

    About Our Lab

    The Multimedia and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory (MAILAB) at National Taiwan Normal University conducts cutting-edge research in computer vision, machine learning, and multimedia analysis with applications in various domains including healthcare, autonomous systems, and content creation.

    Computer Vision

    Developing advanced algorithms for image understanding, object detection, and scene analysis

    Machine Learning

    Creating intelligent systems through deep learning, reinforcement learning, and neural networks

    Multimedia Analysis

    Integrating multiple modalities including visual, audio, and textual data for richer understanding

    Join Our Lab

    MAILAB is always looking for talented and motivated students and researchers interested in computer vision, machine learning, and multimedia analysis.

    We offer opportunities for graduate studies (Master's and PhD), postdoctoral research, and undergraduate research internships.
